title: Single cell sequencing of hippocampus tissues in traumatic brain injury
abstract: A single cell suspension was generated from 24hr TBI and Sham mouse hippocampi, and single-cell mRNAseq libraries were generated with Drop-Seq.
overall_design: Drop-Seq was performed on four separate days using the same age (10 week) and strain (C57BL/6) mice. On day 1, Sham1 and TBI1 were obtained. On day 2, TBI2 was obtained. On day 3, Sham2 was obtained. On day 4, Sham3 and TBI3 were obtained.
summary: A single cell suspension was generated from 24hr TBI and Sham mouse hippocampi, and single-cell mRNAseq libraries were generated with Drop-Seq.
